displayName.english: Welcome to the City of the Dead
displayName.token: Welcome to the City of the Dead
displayName.spanish: Bienvenido a la ciudad de los muertos

description.english: Make it to the police station.
description.token: Make it to the police station.
description.german: Erreichen Sie die Polizeistation.
description.french: Atteindre le commissariat.
description.italian: Raggiungi la centrale di polizia.
description.spanish: Llega a la comisaría.
description.schinese: 抵达警察局。
description.tchinese: 抵達警察局。
description.japanese: 警察署に到着する
description.brazilian: Chegue à delegacia.

description.english: Solve the Goddess Statue puzzle.
description.token: Solve the Goddess Statue puzzle.
description.german: Lösen Sie das Puzzle der Göttinnenstatue.
description.french: Activer la statue de déesse.
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma della statua della Dea.
description.spanish: Resuelve el puzle de la estatua de la diosa.
description.schinese: 解开女神雕像谜题。
description.tchinese: 解開女神雕像謎題。
description.japanese: 女神像のギミックを起動する
description.brazilian: Resolva o enigma da Est. Deusa.

description.english: Escape the police station.
description.token: Escape the police station.
description.german: Entkommen Sie aus der Polizeistation.
description.french: S'échapper du commissariat.
description.italian: Fuggi dalla centrale di polizia.
description.spanish: Huye de la comisaría.
description.schinese: 逃出警察局。
description.tchinese: 逃離警察局。
description.japanese: 警察署を脱出する
description.brazilian: Fuja da delegacia.

description.english: Complete Ada's segment.
description.token: Complete Ada's segment.
description.german: Schließen Sie Adas Segment ab.
description.french: Compléter la partie d'Ada.
description.italian: Completa la sezione di Ada.
description.spanish: Completa la parte de Ada.
description.schinese: 完成艾达的段落。
description.tchinese: 完成艾達的段落。
description.japanese: エイダパートをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua a parte da Ada.

description.english: Complete Sherry's segment.
description.german: Schließen Sie Sherrys Segment ab.
description.french: Compléter la partie de Sherry.
description.italian: Completa la sezione di Sherry.
description.spanish: Completa la parte de Sherry.
description.schinese: 完成雪莉的段落。
description.tchinese: 完成雪莉的段落。
description.japanese: シェリーパートをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua a parte da Sherry.
description.token: Complete Sherry's segment.

displayName.english: A Great Need for a Shower
displayName.token: A Great Need for a Shower

description.english: Escape from the sewers.
description.token: Escape from the sewers.
description.german: Entkommen Sie aus der Kanalisation.
description.french: S'échapper des égouts.
description.italian: Esci dalle fogne.
description.spanish: Escapa de las cloacas.
description.schinese: 逃离下水道。
description.tchinese: 逃離下水道。
description.japanese: 下水道を脱出する
description.brazilian: Fuja dos esgotos.

description.english: Complete Leon's story.
description.token: Complete Leon's story.
description.german: Schließen Sie Leons Kampagne ab.
description.french: Compléter la campagne de Leon.
description.italian: Completa la storia di Leon.
description.spanish: Completa el escenario de Leon.
description.schinese: 完成里昂的剧情。
description.tchinese: 完成里昂的劇情。
description.japanese: レオン編をクリアする

description.english: Complete Claire's story.
description.token: Complete Claire's story.
description.german: Schließen Sie Claires Kampagne ab.
description.french: Compléter la campagne de Claire.
description.italian: Completa la storia di Claire.
description.spanish: Completa el escenario de Claire.
description.schinese: 完成克莱尔的剧情。
description.tchinese: 完成克蕾兒的劇情。
description.japanese: クレア編をクリアする
description.brazilian: Zere com a Claire.

displayName.japanese: アンブレラをぶっ潰す

description.english: Witness the true ending.
description.token: Witness the true ending.
description.german: Erleben Sie das wahre Ende.
description.french: Assister à la vraie fin.
description.italian: Guarda il vero finale.
description.spanish: Ve el final verdadero.
description.schinese: 见证真实结局。
description.tchinese: 達成真實結局。
description.japanese: 真のエンディングを迎える
description.brazilian: Veja o final verdadeiro.

description.english: Combine two items together.
description.token: Combine two items together.
description.german: Kombinieren Sie zwei Gegenstände miteinander.
description.french: Combiner deux objets ensemble.
description.italian: Combina due oggetti.
description.spanish: Combina dos objetos.
description.schinese: 结合两件物品。
description.tchinese: 組合兩件物品。
description.japanese: アイテムの組み合わせを行う
description.brazilian: Combine dois itens.

description.english: Increase your inventory slots.
description.token: Increase your inventory slots.
description.german: Erhöhen Sie die Zahl Ihrer Inventarplätze.
description.french: Agrandir l'inventaire.
description.italian: Aumenta gli slot del tuo inventario.
description.spanish: Aumenta los espacios del inventario.
description.schinese: 扩充物品栏的槽位。
description.tchinese: 增加物品欄的欄位數。
description.japanese: アイテムスロットを拡張する
description.brazilian: Ganhe espaço no inventário.

description.english: Customize a weapon.
description.token: Customize a weapon.
description.german: Modifizieren Sie eine Waffe.
description.french: Modifier une arme.
description.italian: Modifica un'arma.
description.spanish: Personaliza un arma.
description.schinese: 改造一把武器。
description.tchinese: 改裝一把武器。
description.japanese: 武器を改造する
description.brazilian: Personalize uma arma.

description.english: Defeat an enemy with a knife.
description.token: Defeat an enemy with a knife.
description.german: Besiegen Sie einen Gegner mit einem Messer.
description.french: Vaincre un ennemi au couteau.
description.italian: Elimina un nemico usando il coltello.
description.spanish: Derrota a un enemigo con un cuchillo.
description.schinese: 使用匕首击败一名敌人。
description.tchinese: 用刀擊敗一名敵人。
description.japanese: ナイフで敵を倒す
description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo com uma faca.

description.english: Counterattack with a sub-weapon.
description.token: Counterattack with a sub-weapon.
description.german: Führen Sie einen Gegenangriff mit einer Nebenwaffe aus.
description.french: Contre-attaquer avec une arme secondaire.
description.italian: Contrattacca con un'arma secondaria.
description.spanish: Contraataca con un arma secundaria.
description.schinese: 使用次要武器进行反击。
description.tchinese: 以次要武器反擊。
description.japanese: サブウェポンで反撃する
description.brazilian: Revide com uma arma secundária.

description.english: Use Wooden Boards to board up a window.
description.token: Use Wooden Boards to board up a window.
description.german: Vernageln Sie ein Fenster mit Holzbrettern.
description.french: Barricader une fenêtre avec des planches.
description.italian: Usa delle assi di legno per sbarrare una finestra.
description.spanish: Tapa una ventana con tablas de madera.
description.schinese: 将一扇窗户用木板封起来。
description.tchinese: 利用木板封住一扇窗戶。
description.japanese: 窓を木材でふさぐ
description.brazilian: Use tábuas para tapar uma janela.

description.english: Destroy a Mr. Raccoon.
description.token: Destroy a Mr. Raccoon.
description.german: Zerstören Sie einen Mr. Raccoon.
description.french: Détruire un Mr. Raccoon.
description.italian: Distruggi un Mr. Raccoon.
description.spanish: Rompe un Mr. Raccoon.
description.schinese: 摧毁一个浣熊先生。
description.tchinese: 摧毀一個浣熊先生。
description.japanese: Mr.ラクーンを破壊する
description.brazilian: Quebre um Mr. Raccoon.

description.english: Open a portable safe.
description.token: Open a portable safe.
description.german: Knacken Sie einen tragbaren Tresor.
description.french: Ouvrir un coffre portatif.
description.italian: Apri una cassetta di sicurezza portatile.
description.spanish: Abre una caja fuerte portátil.
description.schinese: 打开一个便携式保险箱。
description.tchinese: 打開一個可攜式保險箱。
description.japanese: ポータブルセーフを開ける
description.brazilian: Abra um cofre port.

description.english: Open a dial safe.
description.german: Knacken Sie einen Tresor mit Zahlenschloss.
description.french: Ouvrir un coffre à cadran.
description.italian: Apri una cassaforte.
description.spanish: Abre una caja fuerte.
description.schinese: 打开一个转盘式保险箱。
description.tchinese: 打開一個轉盤式保險箱。
description.japanese: ダイヤルキー/金庫を開錠する
description.brazilian: Abra um cofre mecân.
description.token: Open a dial safe.

description.english: Shoot the grenade you fed to an enemy.
description.token: Shoot the grenade you fed to an enemy.
description.german: Schießen Sie auf die Granate, die Sie einem Gegner in den Mund gerammt haben.
description.french: Tirer sur une grenade mise dans la bouche d'un ennemi.
description.italian: Spara a una granata che hai ficcato in bocca a un nemico.
description.koreana: 적에게 수류탄을 먹인 후 총으로 쏴 폭발시킵니다.
description.spanish: Activa la granada que se trague un enemigo.
description.schinese: 射击引爆您喂给敌人的榴弹。
description.tchinese: 開槍餵榴彈給您的敵人吧。
description.russian: Выстрелите по гранате, которую скормили противнику.
description.japanese: 敵がくわえた手榴弾を撃ちぬく
description.polish: Strzel do granatu w ustach przeciwnika.
description.brazilian: Atire na granada dada ao inimigo.

description.english: Kill 3 enemies at once with a sub-weapon.
description.token: Kill 3 enemies at once with a sub-weapon.
description.german: Töten Sie 3 Gegner augenblicklich mit einer Nebenwaffe.
description.french: Tuer 3 ennemis d'un coup avec une arme secondaire.
description.italian: Uccidi in un colpo solo 3 nemici con un'arma secondaria.
description.spanish: Elimina a 3 enemigos a la vez con un arma secundaria.
description.schinese: 使用次要武器一次杀死 3 名敌人。
description.tchinese: 用次要武器一次殺死 3 名敵人。
description.japanese: サブウェポンで敵をまとめて3体倒す
description.polish: Zabij 3 wrogów naraz za pomocą pomocniczej broni.
description.brazilian: Mate 3 inimigos de uma vez c/ armas sec.

description.english: Shoot a zombie dog or a licker out of the air.
description.token: Shoot a zombie dog or a licker out of the air.
description.german: Schießen Sie einen Zombiehund oder Licker aus der Luft.
description.french: Abattre un chien zombie ou un Licker en l'air.
description.italian: Spara a un cane zombi o a un Licker mentre è in aria.
description.koreana: 공중에 뜬 좀비 개 또는 릭커를 총으로 쏩니다.
description.spanish: Dispara a un perro zombi o a un licker en el aire.
description.schinese: 射击一只在空中的丧尸犬或舔食者。
description.tchinese: 射擊一隻在空中的殭屍犬或利卡。
description.russian: Подстрелите лизуна или собаку-зомби в воздухе.
description.japanese: ゾンビ犬/リッカーを空中で撃ち落とす
description.polish: Strzel do psa zombie lub lizacza będącego w powietrzu.
description.brazilian: Atire em um cão zumbi ou carnífice no ar.

description.english: Paralyze a licker's sense of hearing.
description.token: Paralyze a licker's sense of hearing.
description.german: Lähmen Sie den Hörsinn eines Lickers.
description.french: Neutraliser l'ouïe d'un Licker.
description.italian: Assorda un Licker.
description.spanish: Deja sordo a un licker.
description.schinese: 使一只舔食者的听觉失去作用。
description.tchinese: 讓一隻利卡失去聽覺。
description.japanese: リッカーの聴覚を麻痺させる
description.brazilian: Incapacite a audição de um carnífice.

displayName.spanish: No te va a hacer falta

description.english: Shoot Tyrant's hat off his head.
description.token: Shoot Tyrant's hat off his head.
description.german: Schießen Sie Tyrant den Hut vom Kopf.
description.french: Tirer sur le chapeau du Tyran.
description.italian: Fai cadere il cappello del Tyrant sparandogli in testa.
description.koreana: 총을 쏴 타이런트의 머리에서 모자를 벗깁니다.
description.spanish: Quítale el sombrero a Tyrant de un disparo a la cabeza.
description.schinese: 射下暴君头上的帽子。
description.tchinese: 將暴君頭上的帽子射下來。
description.japanese: タイラントの帽子を撃ち落とす
description.brazilian: Tire o chapéu do Tirano a bala.

description.english: Defeat Stage 2 G using the crane only once.
description.token: Defeat Stage 2 G using the crane only once.
description.german: Besiegen Sie G (Phase 2) und setzen Sie den Kran dabei nur einmal ein.
description.french: Vaincre G (2e forme) en n'utilisant la grue qu'une seule fois.
description.italian: Sconfiggi G (stadio 2) utilizzando la gru solo una volta.
description.koreana: 크레인을 한 번만 사용해 2단계 G를 처치합니다.
description.spanish: Derrota al G (Fase 2) usando la grúa sólo una vez.
description.schinese: 使用起重机一次击败 G 第二形态。
description.tchinese: 利用起重機一次擊敗 G 第 2 形態。
description.russian: Победите «Г» второй формы, использовав кран только один раз.
description.japanese: G第2形態をクレーンを1度しかぶつけずに倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj G w wersji 2, używając żurawia tylko raz.
description.brazilian: Derrote o G (Fase 2) usando o guindaste 1x.

description.english: Using the photo hints, find 2 hidden items.
description.token: Using the photo hints, find 2 hidden items.
description.german: Finden Sie mithilfe der Fotohinweise zwei versteckte Objekte.
description.french: Trouver deux objets cachés grâce aux indices en photo.
description.italian: Trova 2 oggetti nascosti usando gli indizi fotografici.
description.koreana: 사진 힌트를 사용해 숨겨진 아이템 2개를 찾아냅니다.
description.spanish: Encuentra 2 objetos ocultos con pistas fotográficas.
description.schinese: 利用照片提示，找到 2 个隐藏物品。
description.tchinese: 利用照片提示，找出 2 個隱藏物品。
description.russian: Отыщите два спрятанных предмета с помощью подсказок на фото.
description.japanese: 写真のヒントから隠れたアイテムを2つ見つける
description.polish: Znajdź 2 ukryte przedmioty, używając wskazówek ze zdjęć.
description.brazilian: Encontre 2 itens pelas dicas fotográficas.

description.english: Expand inventory slots to max.
description.token: Expand inventory slots to max.
description.german: Maximieren Sie Ihre Inventarplätze.
description.french: Agrandir l'inventaire au maximum.
description.italian: Espandi al massimo gli slot dell'inventario.
description.spanish: Expande al máximo los espacios del inventario.
description.schinese: 将物品栏的槽位数扩充到最大。
description.tchinese: 將物品欄的欄位數擴充到最大。
description.japanese: アイテムスロットを最大まで拡張する
description.polish: Zwiększ liczbę miejsc w ekwipunku do maksimum.
description.brazilian: Maximize os espaços do invent.

description.english: Use only the EMF Visualizer to complete Ada's gameplay segment.
description.token: Use only the EMF Visualizer to complete Ada's gameplay segment.
description.german: Schließen Sie Adas Segment ausschließlich unter Verwendung des EMF Visualizer ab.
description.french: Compléter la partie d'Ada en n'utilisant que le détecteur CEM.
description.italian: Usa solo il Rilevatore EMF per terminare la sezione di Ada.
description.koreana: EMF 비주얼라이저만 사용해 에이다의 게임플레이 세그먼트를 완료합니다.
description.spanish: Termina la parte de Ada usando solo el visualizador EMF.
description.schinese: 只使用电磁场显像器完成艾达的游戏段落。
description.tchinese: 只利用電磁場顯像器完成艾達的遊戲段落。
description.russian: Пройдите сценарий Ады, используя только визуализатор ЭМП.
description.japanese: エイダパートをEMFスキャナープロジェクター以外の武器を使わずにクリアする
description.polish: Użyj tylko wizualizatora EMF do ukończenia segmentu Ady.
description.brazilian: No segmento da Ada, use apenas o Visualizador de CEM.

description.english: Escape the bedroom within 60 seconds during Sherry's segment.
description.token: Escape the bedroom within 60 seconds during Sherry's segment.
description.german: Entkommen Sie in Sherrys Abschnitt innerhalb von 60 Sekunden aus dem Schlafzimmer.
description.french: Quitter la chambre en moins de 60 secondes durant la partie de Sherry.
description.italian: Nella sezione di Sherry, fuggi dalla camera da letto entro 60 secondi.
description.spanish: Durante la parte de Sherry, huye de la habitación en 60 segundos.
description.schinese: 在雪莉的段落中，于 60 秒之内逃出卧室。
description.tchinese: 在雪莉的段落中，於 60 秒內逃出臥室。
description.russian: В сценарии Шерри сбегите из спальни за 60 сек.
description.japanese: シェリーパートで寝室から60秒以内に脱出する
description.polish: Ucieknij z pokoju w 60 sekund w trakcie segmentu Sherry.
description.brazilian: No segmento da Sherry, fuja do quarto em 60 segundos.

displayName.italian: Chi ha tempo non aspetti tempo

description.english: Defeat Stage 4 G with 4+ minutes left until detonation.
description.token: Defeat Stage 4 G with 4+ minutes left until detonation.
description.german: Besiegen Sie G (Phase 4) mit mindestens 4 Minuten bis zur Detonation.
description.french: Vaincre G (4e forme) au moins 4 minutes avant la détonation.
description.italian: Sconfiggi G (stadio 4) con almeno 4 minuti alla detonazione.
description.spanish: Derrota al G (Fase 4) cuando queden +4 min. para la explosión.
description.schinese: 在距离爆炸还剩下至少 4 分钟时，击败 G 第四形态。
description.tchinese: 在離爆炸還剩下 4 分鐘以上時擊敗 G 第 4 形態。
description.russian: Победите «Г» четвертой формы за 4+ мин. до взрыва.
description.japanese: G第4形態を爆発まで4分以上残して倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj G w wersji 4 z zapasem co najmniej 4 min do detonacji.
description.brazilian: Vença o G Fase 4 faltando 4+ minutos para a explosão.

displayName.english: In the Blink of an Eye
displayName.token: In the Blink of an Eye

description.english: Defeat Super Tyrant with 5+ minutes left until detonation.
description.token: Defeat Super Tyrant with 5+ minutes left until detonation.
description.german: Besiegen Sie Super-Tyrant mit mindestens 5 Minuten bis zur Detonation.
description.french: Vaincre le Tyran S au moins 5 minutes avant la détonation.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Super Tyrant con almeno 5 minuti alla detonazione.
description.koreana: 폭파까지 5+분 남은 상태로 슈퍼 타이런트를 처치합니다.
description.spanish: Derrota al Super Tyrant cuando queden +5 min. para la explosión.
description.schinese: 在距离爆炸还剩下至少 5 分钟前，击败超级暴君。
description.tchinese: 在離爆炸還剩下 5 分鐘以上時擊敗超級暴君。
description.russian: Победите супертирана за 5+ мин. до взрыва.
description.japanese: スーパータイラントを爆発まで5分以上残して倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj Super Tyrana z zapasem co najmniej 5 min do detonacji.
description.brazilian: Vença o Supertirano faltando 5+ minutos para a explosão.

description.english: Read all of the files.
description.token: Read all of the files.
description.german: Lesen Sie alle Akten.
description.french: Lire tous les fichiers.
description.italian: Leggi tutti i documenti.
description.spanish: Lee todos los archivos.
description.schinese: 阅读游戏中所有的文件。
description.tchinese: 閱讀所有檔案。
description.japanese: 全てのファイルを読む
description.brazilian: Leia todos arquivos.

description.english: Destroy all Mr. Raccoons.
description.token: Destroy all Mr. Raccoons.
description.german: Zerstören Sie alle Mr. Raccoons.
description.french: Détruire tous les Mr. Raccoon.
description.italian: Distruggi tutti i Mr. Raccoon.
description.spanish: Destruye todos los Mr. Raccoons.
description.schinese: 摧毁所有的浣熊先生。
description.tchinese: 摧毀所有的浣熊先生。
description.japanese: 全てのMr.ラクーンを破壊する
description.brazilian: Destrua todos Mr. Raccoon.

description.english: Open all of the safes and locks in the game.
description.token: Open all of the safes and locks in the game.
description.german: Öffnen Sie alle Tresore und Schlösser im Spiel.
description.french: Ouvrir tous les coffres et cadenas du jeu.
description.italian: Apri tutte le casseforti e i lucchetti del gioco.
description.koreana: 게임 내 모든 금고 및 자물쇠를 엽니다.
description.spanish: Abre todas las cajas y cerraduras del juego.
description.schinese: 打开游戏中所有的锁和保险箱。
description.tchinese: 打開遊戲中所有的保險箱和鎖。
description.russian: Вскройте все сейфы и замки в игре.
description.japanese: 全てのダイヤルキーと金庫を開錠する
description.polish: Otwórz wszystkie sejfy i zamki w grze.
description.brazilian: Abra todos os cofres e trancas no jogo.

description.english: Complete Leon's story on "Standard" or "Hardcore" with an S rank.
description.token: Complete Leon's story on "Standard" or "Hardcore" with an S rank.
description.german: Schließen Sie Leons Kampagne auf "Standard" oder "Veteran" mit Rang S ab.
description.french: Compléter la campagne de Leon en "Normal" ou "Hardcore" avec le rang S.
description.italian: Completa la storia di Leon in modalità "Standard" o "Estrema" con il grado S.
description.koreana: 레온의 스토리를 "일반" 또는 "하드코어" 모드에서 S 등급으로 완료합니다.
description.spanish: Completa el escenario de Leon en modo "Estándar" o "Hardcore" con rango S.
description.schinese: 在“标准”或“专家”模式中，以 S 级完成里昂的剧情。
description.tchinese: 在「標準」或「硬派」模式中，以 S 級完成里昂的劇情。
description.russian: Пройдите кампанию Леона в режиме «Стандартный» или «Хардкор» с рангом S.
description.japanese: ゲームモード「STANDARD」以上のレオン編をクリアランクSでクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ historię Leona w trybie „Standardowy” lub „Hardcore” z rangą S.
description.brazilian: Consiga um S na história do Leon ("Padrão" ou "Intenso").

description.tchinese: 在「標準」或「硬派」模式中，以 S 級完成克蕾兒的劇情。

description.schinese: 在“专家”游戏模式中完成里昂的剧情。
description.tchinese: 在「硬派」遊戲模式中完成里昂的劇情。

description.english: Complete the game without using a recovery item.
description.token: Complete the game without using a recovery item.
description.german: Schließen Sie das Spiel ab, ohne ein Heilungsobjekt zu verwenden.
description.french: Compléter le jeu sans utiliser d'objet de soin.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza usare un oggetto curativo.
description.koreana: 회복 아이템을 사용하지 않고 게임을 완료합니다.
description.spanish: Completa una partida sin usar ningún objeto de recuperación.
description.schinese: 在不使用治疗物品的情况下完成游戏。
description.tchinese: 在未使用治療物品的情況下完成遊戲。
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не пользуясь средствами восстановления.
description.japanese: 回復アイテムを一度も使わずにクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ grę, nie korzystając z przedmiotów regenerujących.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo sem usar um item de recuperação.

description.english: Clear the game without opening the item box.
description.token: Clear the game without opening the item box.
description.german: Schließen Sie das Spiel ab, ohne die Inventarbox zu öffnen.
description.french: Compléter le jeu sans ouvrir le coffre à objets.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza aprire la cassa oggetti.
description.koreana: 아이템 상자를 열지 않고 게임을 완료합니다.
description.spanish: Completa una partida sin abrir el baúl de objetos.
description.schinese: 在不开启物品箱的情况下完成游戏。
description.tchinese: 在未開啟置物箱的情況下通過遊戲。
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не открывая ящик с предметами.
description.japanese: アイテムボックスを一度も開かずにクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ grę, nie otwierając skrzynki na przedmioty.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo sem abrir o baú.

description.english: Take 14000 steps or fewer in one playthrough.
description.token: Take 14000 steps or fewer in one playthrough.
description.german: Machen Sie höchstens 14000 Schritte in einem Spieldurchlauf.
description.french: Ne pas effectuer plus de 14000 pas dans une partie.
description.italian: Fai 14000 passi o meno in un singolo playthrough.
description.koreana: 게임을 한 번 완료할 때까지 발걸음을 14000회 이하로 유지합니다.
description.spanish: Da 14000 pasos o menos en una partida.
description.schinese: 在单次通关过程中，移动不超过 14000 步。
description.tchinese: 在單次通關過程中，移動不超過 14000 步。
description.russian: Сделайте не более 14000 шагов за одно прохождение.
description.japanese: 歩数を14000歩以内でクリアする
description.polish: Wykonaj maks. 14000 kroków podczas jednego przejścia gry.
description.brazilian: Dê 14000 ou menos passos no jogo todo.

description.english: Complete "The 4th Survivor" extra mode.
description.token: Complete "The 4th Survivor" extra mode.
description.german: Schließen Sie den Zusatzmodus "The 4th Survivor" ab.
description.french: Compléter le mode additionnel "Le 4e survivant".
description.italian: Completa la modalità extra "Il 4° sopravvissuto".
description.spanish: Completa el modo extra "El 4.º superviviente".
description.schinese: 完成“第4幸存者”模式。
description.tchinese: 完成額外模式「第 4 倖存者」。
description.japanese: 【Extra】The 4th Survivorをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua o modo "O 4º Sobrevivente".

description.english: Complete the No Way Out scenario. (No training mode)
description.german: Schließen Sie das Szenario "No Way Out" ab. (Trainingsmodus ausgenommen)
description.french: Compléter le scénario "Sans issue". (Hors mode Entraînement)
description.italian: Completa lo scenario "Sotto assedio". (Non disponibile nella modalità "Allenamento")
description.spanish: Completa el escenario "Sin salida". (Modo práctica no válido)
description.schinese: 完成“无路可逃”剧情。（非新训模式）
description.tchinese: 完成「無路可逃」劇情。（非新訓模式）
description.russian: Пройдите сценарий «Нет выхода» не в режиме обучения.
description.japanese: シナリオ「No Way Out」をクリアする（「難易度：リハーサル」不可）
description.polish: Ukończ scenariusz Bez wyjścia (nie w trybie treningu).
description.brazilian: Conclua o cenário Sem Escapatória. (Sem modo o de treinamento)
description.token: NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_10_DESC

description.english: Destroy all Mr. Raccoons hidden in The Ghost Survivors mode.
description.german: Zerstören Sie im Modus "The Ghost Survivors" alle versteckten Mr.-Raccoon-Figuren.
description.french: Détruire tous les Mr. Raccoon cachés dans le mode "Les survivants fantômes".
description.italian: Distruggi tutti i Mr. Raccoon nascosti nella modalità "I sopravvissuti fantasma".
description.koreana: 유령 생존자 모드에 숨겨져 있는 모든 미스터 라쿤을 파괴합니다.
description.spanish: Destruye todos los Mr. Raccoon escondidos en el modo "Los otros supervivientes".
description.schinese: 在“幽灵生还者”模式中摧毁所有隐藏的浣熊先生。
description.tchinese: 在「幽靈生還者」模式中摧毀所有隱藏的浣熊先生。
description.russian: Уничтожьте всех мистеров Енотов в режиме «Выжившие призраки».
description.japanese: The Ghost Survivorsに隠されたMr.ラクーンを全て破壊する
description.polish: Zniszcz wszystkich Panów Szopów ukrytych w trybie Widmowi ocalali.
description.brazilian: Destrua todos os Mr. Raccoons escondidos no modo Sobreviventes Perdidos.
description.token: NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_11_DESC

description.english: Read a letter left behind by Jill.
description.german: Lesen Sie einen Brief, der von Jill zurückgelassen wurde.
description.french: Lire un message laissé par Jill.
description.italian: Leggi la lettera lasciata da Jill.
description.spanish: Lee un mensaje escrito por Jill.
description.schinese: 阅读某个S.T.A.R.S.成员留下的信件
description.tchinese: 閱讀某個S.T.A.R.S.成員留下的信件
description.japanese: ジルからのメモを読む
description.brazilian: Leia uma carta deixada por Jill.
